summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LyricLab song lyrics generation app. Backend APIs, frontend UI, and authentication integration all working correctly with only one minor backend status code issue.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 on successful song creation
minor_bugs.impact: No functional impact - song creation works correctly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with 'Start Writing' CTA button
Test user and session creation in MongoDB successful
/api/songs CRUD operations working (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Library page loads with search and filter controls
Song detail page shows song info with edit/duplicate/export buttons
Generate page shows all controls (genre, mood, sliders, etc.)
Song creation via browser API calls successful
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor backend issue: /api/songs endpoint should return 201 status code instead of 200 for successful song creation (currently in server.py line 432-454)
